data.text: Ule nai ngai kei'n rilsik kitihi ningni'n suoilekleiya leijet ningte, ajarchu nangni rakip-in Dan jarra ningjet, khawa khachu mi rakip in inringlaiseng Dan in wai aroonsik eii.
Halli minkhina inkhat ah, aruothar kaom numeisa'n aringkhuo omlaiseng aruothar Dan in akhitsik eii; takkha aruothar thisuo inchu ama kha aruothar Dan nuoiya omnunijei.

Takkha aruothar ringpumma numeisa'n Pasal inkhatdiang inn anei-inchu ama kha zool-inthai tia inkoisik eii, takkha aruothar thijei inchu ama Dan makheiya amasuojei halli pasal inkhatdiang inn anei innum ama kha zool-inthai tinunujei.

Khawajarra ule nai ngai eini rakip um Christa taksale inruoiya Danna nithi ejei, halli atuunchu kathi makheiya karingjei ama mikha ni-ejei, khawajarra eini rakip Pathian chuonna arei kaom ni-esik eii.
Ajarchu eini'n taksa imanuomma nileiomlai, Dan khan nipumma chuon hongthoa taksa imanuom kha hongminngarra halli nitho ngai rakip kha thina ajuo inchang jei.
Takkha atuunchu eini rakip thina ka eii kanaleisur Dan makheiya nakatanjei, khale inruoiya eini'n Dan maruo-ah lei-injia kha sepa thokhai numinjei, takkha akathar Ratha lamkhan sepa nithosik ejei.

Angme eini'n nitisik, Dan hi manube? Khawakha etheinuni, takkha Dan in ajar eya kei'n manu hi kijet eii, ajarchu “Ra-ot maru” tihi Dan in aleitimak inchu kei'n ra-ot tihi leijetnuning. Suok 20:17; Innidan 5:21
Khale inruoiya chongpeii jarra manu'n aphakacha aleiya kei kadiang taksa manuomna ngaikhan namasok, ajarchu Dan inchenmak manu chu kathi kha eii.
Halli kei'n aphakhat ah Dan inchenleiya kaleiring, takkha chongpeii kha ajuopha khan manu kha honginsoonna aleiring,
halli kei kathijei. Halli ringnasik ka-eii hiwa chongpeii in kei kasik achu thina inchangjei.
Han, Manu in aphakacha aleiya chongpeii kha inliingna-ah kei kadiang maleisei katho namin eya, kei anathatjei. Inphut 3:17
Khawajarra Dan chu inthiang eii khat-um chongpeii hium inthiang, kadik halli katha kha-um a-eii.

Halle akatha kha'n keikading thina inapebe? Khawakha etheinuni! takkha manu kha eii akatha inliingna ah chuon katho, manu omchan kha inthiangnga manu eii tia inlarnasik chongpeii khan ajar eya manu hi hituuk kathamak manu eii tia anaminmu.
Khale inruoiya Dan hichu rathalam eii tia eini'n nijet, takkha keichu rathalam mi emong, manu kathosik-ah innajuor suok ka-ang ka eii.
Halli kei'n angme kithohi kei'n jetmator mong, han kei'n kithozoot kha kei'n thomong, takkha kei'n kimatir kha kei'n katho. Gal 5:17
Khale inruoiya kei'n kithozootmak chuonkha kei'n katho, hiwa tinachu kei'n Dan hi adik tia kazoot.
Khawajarra kei'n hiwa rakip kithohi kei itho ekhaimakjei, takkha kei kasuungnga kaom manu inamintho eii.
Halli kei'n kajet kei manu omchan jarra kei kasuungnga iteii katha kha ommakjei, halli kei'n kadik kha thonasik-ah kangaidon takkha kei'n thomatormong.
Tichu kei'n katha kithozoot kha thomatormong, khawa rathuulla kei'n kithozootmak kathamak kha kei'n kathojei.
Khale inruoiya kei'n kithozootmak kha kei'n katho inchu, kei itho emakjei takkha kei kasuungnga kaom manu itho eii.
Khawale inruoiya kei'n Dan chuontho kha kamu, itichu kei'n katha kathozoot kaalkhan kathamak kha keile inruoiya aom.
Kei kamalung sungnga Pathian Dan kha kamanuom.

Takkha aleiilaak Dan inkhat-in kei kapum saram rakip-ah chuon tho-ah kaom kei'n kamu, halli inmani'n kei kamalungnga kaom Dan khale inhalpuiya raal inthoa inom, halli kei kadiang manu Dan in nasurra kapum suungnga chuon inthoa inom.
Kei hi angtuk kahoimak mi ka emejei! hiwa kathi lamtiang kanaruoi taksa makheiya atu'n nasanring sikme?
Kei'n Pumi Jisu Christa diangnga inphut hiwa ngai rakip katho Pathian kha kaminpaak!
